name: Champions League Soccer
description:
Live the Champions League Cup while it is played

Choose your team and play the matches of the real draw until the final.

Served by superbs 3D graphics, animations and sounds, Champions League (European Clubs League) Football Cup is based on a highly realistic physic engine in which football moves have been coded by football fans. 

Main Features

-Single Or 2 players 
-Full 3D environnement
-Real Champions League Draw
-5 different team strategy
-Gamepad, mouse or keyboard
